title: Miriam Valdes Retains Her Distinction as National Researcher Level 1 at SNI

config: Congratulations to Miriam Valdes on keeping her distinction as a National Researcher in the Research National System (SNI, Sistema Nacional de Investigadores). In early January, CONACyT (National Council of Science and Technology) published the 2021 SNI results. From 7,753 researchers who applied to keep their distinction, only 5,810 succeeded. There is a total historical number of 36,714 national researchers. Find out more in the official press release here. Congratulations Miriam!
